death.attack.aero_additions.wind_blade: %1$s was struck down by %2$s's Wind Blade
death.attack.asphyxiation: %s discovered that air is essential to life
item.aero_additions.updraft_tome.guide: Can be obtained from Ominous Vaults in Trial Chambers.
spell.aero_additions.airblast.guide: Quickly fire a small gust of air, capable of reflecting projectiles. Mmmph mmmph!
spell.aero_additions.airstep.guide: Execute a series of mid-air jumps, in rapid succession.
spell.aero_additions.asphyxiate.guide: Draw the air out of the target's lungs, slowly killing them.
spell.aero_additions.feather_fall.guide: Give you and your nearby allies the Slow Falling effect.
spell.aero_additions.flush.guide: Expel a large quantity of water around you.
spell.aero_additions.updraft.guide: Launch enemies into the air, temporarily stunning them.
spell.aero_additions.wind_blade.guide: Conjure a swiftly-moving blade of pure, swirling wind, dealing low damage but high knockback upon impact.
spell.aero_additions.wind_charge.guide: Fire a powerful wind charge, which launches enemies on impact.
spell.aero_additions.wind_shield.guide: Form a swirling shield of air around your body, reflecting any projectile coming your way.
